Question: What is the email address and office location of the professor teaching the course with ID 102 during the Spring 2023 semester?
Cypher:
MATCH (prof:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course)
WHERE course.course_id = 102 AND teaches.semester = "Spring" AND teaches.year = 2023
RETURN prof, teaches, course, prof.email, prof.office
Rewrite: What are the office location and email address of the professor who teaches course ID 102 in the Spring 2023 semester?

Question: Can you provide the first name, last name, and gender of the student with ID 458 who enrolled in the course titled 'Data Structures'?
Cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[enrollment:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)
WHERE student.student_id = 458 AND course.name = 'Data Structures'
RETURN student, enrollment, course, student.first_name, student.last_name, student.gender
Rewrite: Could you supply the first name, last name, and gender for the student with ID 458 registered in the 'Data Structures' course?

Question: What are the name and description of the course offered by the 'Electrical Engineering' department that requires 3 credits?
Cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[offer:OFFERS]->(course:Course)
WHERE department.name="Electrical Engineering" AND course.credits=3
RETURN department, offer, course, course.name, course.description
Rewrite: Can you provide the name and description of the 3-credit course from the 'Electrical Engineering' department?

Question: Which professor managed the 'Finance' department starting from January 1st, 2018 to December 31st, 2021?
Cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[manages:MANAGES]->(department:Department)
WHERE department.name = "Finance" AND manages.start_date >= date("2018-01-01") AND manages.end_date <= date("2021-12-31")
RETURN professor, manages, department, professor.professor_id, professor.first_name, professor.last_name
Rewrite: From January 1st, 2018 to December 31st, 2021, which professor was in charge of the 'Finance' department?

Question: Find the maximum capacity and room number of the classroom where the event titled 'Graduation 2023' was held.
Cypher:
MATCH (event:Event)-[heldInRelation:HELD_IN]->(classroom:Classroom)
WHERE event.title = 'Graduation 2023'
RETURN event, heldInRelation, classroom, classroom.capacity, classroom.room_number
Rewrite: Determine the largest capacity and number of the room that hosted the 'Graduation 2023' event.

Question: Provide the first name and email of all students belonging to the department located in 'Thompson' building.
Cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[belongs:BELONGS_TO]->(department:Department)
WHERE department.building = 'Thompson'
RETURN student, belongs, department, student.first_name, student.email
Rewrite: List the first names and emails of all students associated with the department in the 'Thompson' building.

Question: What grade did student John Doe receive in the 'Algorithms' course he enrolled in on September 1st, 2021?
Cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[enrollment:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)
WHERE student.first_name="John" AND student.last_name="Doe" AND course.name="Algorithms" AND enrollment.enrollment_date = date("2021-09-01")
RETURN student, enrollment, course, enrollment.grade
Rewrite: What was the grade awarded to John Doe in the 'Algorithms' course for which he registered on September 1st, 2021?

Question: For the course 'Introduction to Psychology' taught in Fall 2022, which professor was teaching and what was their specialization?
Cypher:
MATCH (prof:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course)
WHERE course.name="Introduction to Psychology" AND teaches.semester="Fall" AND teaches.year=2022
RETURN prof, teaches, course, prof.specialization
Rewrite: Who taught the 'Introduction to Psychology' course in Fall 2022, and what was their area of expertise?

Question: When did the professor who started advising student Sarah Miller in 2019 cease their advisory role?
Cypher:
MATCH (prof:Professor)-[advise:ADVISES]->(student:Student)
WHERE student.first_name = "Sarah" AND student.last_name = "Miller" AND advise.start_date.year = 2019
RETURN prof, advise, student, advise.end_date
Rewrite: When did the professor who began mentoring Sarah Miller in 2019 end their guidance?

Question: What was the attendance date for student Emily Tran for the event titled 'Career Fair 2021'?
Cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[attendance:ATTENDS]->(event:Event)
WHERE student.first_name="Emily" AND student.last_name="Tran" AND event.title="Career Fair 2021"
RETURN student, attendance, event, attendance.attendance_date
Rewrite: On which date did student Emily Tran attend the event called 'Career Fair 2021'?

Question: Which department offers the course with ID 304, and what is its building location?
Cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[offering:OFFERS]->(course:Course)
WHERE course.course_id = 304
RETURN department, offering, course, department.name, department.building
Rewrite: Which department provides the course identified by ID 304, and where is the building it's located in?

Question: What semester and year did Professor Smith begin lecturing in the classroom 101B?
Cypher:
MATCH (prof:Professor)-[lecture:LECTURES_IN]->(classroom:Classroom)
WHERE prof.last_name = "Smith" AND classroom.room_number = "101B"
RETURN prof, lecture, classroom, lecture.semester, lecture.year

Question: How many students are enrolled in each course offered by the 'Mathematics' department?
Cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[:OFFERS]->(course:Course)<-[:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)
WHERE department.name = "Mathematics"
RETURN course.name, COUNT(student) AS NumberOfStudents
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[relation3:OFFERS]->(course:Course)<-[relation4:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)
WHERE department.name = "Mathematics"
RETURN course.name, COUNT(student) AS NumberOfStudents
Rewrite: For each course provided by the 'Mathematics' department, what is the number of students enrolled?

Question: What is the average grade of students enrolled in the 'Organic Chemistry' course?
Cypher:
MATCH (course:Course)<-[enrolled:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)
WHERE course.name = "Organic Chemistry"
RETURN AVG(enrolled.grade)
Rewrite: What is the mean grade for students taking the 'Organic Chemistry' course?

Question: Count the number of students who attended the 'New Year Gala 2022' event held in the 'Main Auditorium'.
Cypher:
MATCH (event:Event)<-[attends:ATTENDS]-(student:Student)
MATCH (classroom:Classroom)<-[held_in:HELD_IN]-(event)
WHERE event.title = "New Year Gala 2022" AND classroom.building = "Main Auditorium"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT student)
Rewrite: Tally the total students present at the 'New Year Gala 2022' held in the 'Main Auditorium'.

Question: What is the minimum and maximum number of credits offered by courses in the 'Biology' department?
Cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[offer:OFFERS]->(course:Course)
WHERE department.name = "Biology"
RETURN MIN(course.credits) AS MinCredits, MAX(course.credits) AS MaxCredits
Rewrite: What is the range of credits available for courses in the 'Biology' department?

Question: How many professors have taught the 'Quantum Mechanics' course since 2018?
Cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course)
WHERE course.name = "Quantum Mechanics" AND teaches.year >= 2018
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT professor)
Rewrite: Since 2018, how many professors have instructed the 'Quantum Mechanics' course?

Question: What is the total capacity of all classrooms where events titled 'Orientation Day' were held in 2023?
Cypher:
MATCH (event:Event)-[held_in:HELD_IN]->(classroom:Classroom)
WHERE event.title="Orientation Day" AND event.date.year=2023
RETURN SUM(classroom.capacity)
Rewrite: What is the combined capacity of classrooms that hosted events called 'Orientation Day' in 2023?
